Contemporary Applied Arts, is London’s original multi-disciplinary applied arts gallery.
We are a registered charity and a membership organisation with more than two hundred leading British-based artists working in ceramics, furniture, glass, jewellery, metal, paper, textiles and wood. We view this interdisciplinary approach as a harmonious dialogue between materials, techniques.

factsheet.heading: About CAA
paragraphs:
Contemporary Applied Arts, often called CAA, is London’s original multi-disciplinary applied arts gallery. We are based at 6 Paddington Street. 
 
For more than 75 years, we have championed and promoted only the very best of British applied arts. Our sole aims are to advocate for the applied arts and to campaign for and foster quality and innovation in this field.
 
We are a registered charity and a membership organisation with more than two hundred leading British-based artists working in ceramics, furniture, glass, jewellery, metal, paper, textiles and wood. We view this interdisciplinary approach as a harmonious dialogue between materials, techniques and diverse approaches to making. Selected maker members are rigorously chosen by a panel of their peers. Belonging to CAA is seen as a kite mark of excellence.

name: Contemporary Applied Arts
